name: Lexagrana
summary: Lexagrana is a new take on the brain teaser word puzzles, utilizing unique sliding block puzzle mechanism with shifting letters, combined with the classic form-the-words game. Each time you move a block, the letter printed on it will shift to the next letter in alphabetical order, and the move count will be deducted. Move all the blocks to form the correct words based on a specific topic in each level. Test your skill on dozens of challenging handcrafted word puzzles.
